summary: A transportation booking application that integrates real-world city names and pricing data from booking platforms like RedBus for bus, train, and taxi services
architectural_notes: Use real-world city names and pricing data from transportation booking platforms
Support multiple transportation modes: bus, train, and taxi

existing_features.title: Ensure all frontend displays (route cards, detail pages, booking summaries, admin tables) correctly show the updated real city names and pricing for all transport types

new_feature_requests.summary: Integrate real city names and rates from RedBus or similar booking sites for bus services
Apply real pricing data for train bookings based on booking platform rates
Implement real city names and taxi fare rates from booking platforms
Replace placeholder city names with real city data from RedBus or similar booking platforms (e.g., MakeMyTrip, Goibibo) for all transport types (bus, train, taxi)
Update bus route pricing structure to reflect real RedBus fare data including base fare, taxes, and service fees
Update train route pricing to use real-world fare data from booking platforms like IRCTC, MakeMyTrip, or similar services
Update taxi pricing model to reflect real-world rates from booking platforms like Ola, Uber, or local taxi services based on distance and vehicle type
